hero.title: Ignite Your Next Career Chapter
hero.subtitle: Clarity. Direction. Momentum.
hero.description: NovaWork Global helps professionals navigate career change with a proven system that blends hands on human experience in career coaching with intelligent AI tools, so you move forward with confidence and clarity.

trust.title: Trusted by Professionals Worldwide
trust.subtitle: Real results from real people who transformed their careers with our proven system
trust.testimonial: NovaWork Global gave me the clarity and tools I needed to make a confident career transition. The combination of expert guidance and AI-powered tools made all the difference.

problem.descriptionPart1: Most people don’t get stuck because they lack talent.
problem.descriptionPart2: They get stuck because they don’t know which move makes sense next.
problem.card1: Unsure which role or industry fits you now
problem.card2: Impacted by layoffs, AI disruption, or market shifts
problem.card3: Torn between multiple paths with no clear direction

philosophy.quotePart1: We believe the future of work isn't about competing with AI, but
philosophy.precisionText: Our algorithms analyze millions of data points to identify market gaps that match your unique executive DNA. No guessing, just data-driven strategy.
philosophy.empathyText: Technology opens the door, but human connection walks through it. We coach you to master the nuances of leadership storytelling that AI cannot replicate.

differentiator.title: Human Expertise + AI Intelligence
differentiator.description: We combine 30+ years of hands-on career coaching with intelligent AI tools, so you get the depth of human insight and the speed of technology.
differentiator.humanCardText: Built by career coaches who've guided thousands through successful transitions. Real experience, proven frameworks.
differentiator.aiCardText: Smart automation handles the heavy lifting, ATS optimization, job matching, resume building, so you move faster.
differentiator.pathCardText: Not generic advice. A tailored strategy that adapts to your background, goals, and timeline.
differentiator.resultText: You get expert-level guidance without waiting weeks for a consultant, and AI-speed execution without losing the human touch that actually makes career change work.

programs.title: Select your Paths
programs.description: Select the trajectory that aligns with your professional objective.

novarearchitect.title: NovaRearchitect™

novarearchitect.description: For executives seeking a pivot. Redefine your value proposition and break into new industries.

novalign.title: NovaAlign™
novalign.subtitle: Leadership Integration
novalign.description: First 90 days mastery. Ensure you not only land the job but lead with immediate impact.

cta.title: Ready to Start Your Next Career Chapter?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of professionals who've transformed their careers with NovaWork Global

menu.title: Resume Builder
menu.subtitle: Create a professional, ATS-optimized resume. Follow the steps below or use individual tools.

menu.applyDescLocked: Upgrade to Momentum to access our AI-powered job search engine.
menu.workExperienceDesc: Build your career history with ease.
menu.accomplishmentLibraryDesc: Your personal bank of achievements — pick, tag, and auto-assemble for any job.

profile.title: Professional Profile
profile.subtitle: Define who you are and what you bring to the table
profile.whoYouAreHelp: One powerful sentence that defines your professional identity.
profile.softSkillsHelp: Describe your leadership style and interpersonal strengths.
profile.areasOfExcellenceHelp: Key domains where you act as a subject matter expert.

jdAnalyzer.profileIncomplete: Your profile is incomplete. Please complete your mandatory profile information (Full Name, Phone, and Location) before exporting your resume.

workExperience.companyDescPlaceholder: e.g., Global leader in Logistics and Supply Chain solutions
workExperience.scopeHelp: High-level summary of your role. Metrics should go in accomplishments.
workExperience.scopePlaceholder: Led the global procurement strategy for...
workExperience.title: Work Experience
workExperience.startAdding: Start by adding your most recent role
workExperience.dragDrop: Drag and drop your resume here
workExperience.supportFormat: Support for PDF and DOCX files
workExperience.importDescription: Upload your existing resume (PDF or DOCX) and we'll automatically extract your work experience using AI.
workExperience.selectCARStory: Select a CAR Story to Convert
workExperience.noUnconvertedStories: No unconverted CAR stories available. Create more in the CAR Story Builder.
workExperience.bulletPlaceholder: e.g., Led team of 12 engineers to deliver new payment system, reducing transaction time by 40% and saving $2M annually
workExperience.noBankItems: Your accomplishment bank is empty. Add items in the Library first.

par.title: CAR Story Builder
par.subtitle: Challenge. Action. Result. The framework for powerful accomplishments.
par.description: Structure your accomplishments using the Challenge-Action-Result framework.
par.noStoriesHelp: Create stories to highlight your problem-solving skills.
par.problemHelp: What specific problem or situation did you face?
par.actionsHelp: What specific steps did YOU take? (Use active verbs)
par.willDoAgainHelp: Mark if this is a type of work you enjoy and want to repeat.

errors.requiredFields: Please fill in Challenge and Result fields first

placeholders.whoYouAre: e.g., Senior Product Manager with 10+ years driving digital transformation in FinTech.
placeholders.coreSkills: e.g., Strategic Planning, Agile Methodologies, Stakeholder Management, Python, SQL.
placeholders.softSkills: e.g., Empathetic leader who builds high-performing teams through mentorship and clear communication.
placeholders.areasOfExcellence: e.g., Project Management, budget Planning, Team Leadership
placeholders.roleCompany: e.g., Senior Product Manager at Google
placeholders.problem: e.g., Product adoption was declining 15% QoQ due to poor onboarding UX
placeholders.result: e.g., Increased user activation by 40% in 3 months, reduced churn from 25% to 12%, and generated $2M in additional ARR
placeholders.action1: e.g., Conducted user research with 50+ customers
placeholders.action3: e.g., Collaborated with engineering to implement changes

accomplishmentLibrary.title: Accomplishment Library
accomplishmentLibrary.subtitle: Your personal bank of achievements — organized, tagged, and ready for any resume.
accomplishmentLibrary.importNone: No new accomplishments to import — all are already in your library.
accomplishmentLibrary.noAccomplishmentsHelp: Start building your library by adding accomplishments or importing them from your work experience.
accomplishmentLibrary.autoAssembleHelp: Enter a target job title and let AI pick the best accomplishments for your resume.
accomplishmentLibrary.bulletPlaceholder: e.g., Led team of 12 to deliver payment system, reducing transaction time by 40%

dashboard.whatToAchieve: What do you want to achieve today?
dashboard.pickFocus: Pick a focus — we'll guide you step-by-step with the fastest path to results.
dashboard.buildMyResumeDesc: Continue where you left off. We'll prioritize edits to improve ATS match and clarity.
dashboard.careerVisionDesc: Get a clear understanding of who you are and what is your success formula.
dashboard.resumeBuilderDesc: Build an interview magnet resume and your personal accomplishment bank.
dashboard.jobSearchDesc: Use these techniques and get called for an interview 75% faster than others.
dashboard.interviewMasteryDesc: Be the one they choose. Understand and practice the interview to be the winning candidate.
